alert.note: Alert for Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:39PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA AND EAST CENTRAL WESTMORELAND COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT... At 1039 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Black Lick, or near Homer City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homer City, Black Lick, Seward, Vintondale, Armagh, Lucerne Mines, Brush Vly, and Yellow Creek State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Westmoreland Ridges
